text: Hi, does anyone have any experience with CLEAN THEME 6-1 from HelpfulHero? I need to add a child css to the original theme without setting the whole page to use child theme.

You can add CSS to an individual page via the advanced settings instead of the child.css if you don't want to swap the theme/template.

CC: <@UA5DFM7CK> question about CSS for Clean

<@U04C7B6FQ10> you can create a stylesheet and then add it here which you'll find in the Content Settings section of HubSpot. This will be global for all pages.  Frankly, it's not ideal to do it this way but if you really must this is the only option if you're not setting up a child theme.
Hi! I've also been trying to figure this out -- did you manage to get the syntax for this?
